Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Hannah Gertrud Müller on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Hannah Gertrud Müller is a 46 year old CEO from Austria. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
Family Background: Hannah Gertrud Müller is married to Schmidt. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Hannah completed her secondary education at HAK/HAS Grödig in 1997.
Hannah earned her degree from Graz University of Technology in 2002.
She also pursued further higher education at Montanuniversität Leoben, graduating in 2007.
Occupation History:
Hannah Gertrud Müller is a 46 year old and comes from Austria.
Hannah Gertrud Müller's first role was as a Research Scientist at Baxter BioScience, where she worked diligently from 2002 to 2005 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2006, she moved to Baxter BioScience to work as a Biotech Startup Founder, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2011 till now, she served as a CEO at Marinomed Biotechnologie GmbH, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 300000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has townhouse located in Bruck an der Mur, worth 1170000 EUR.

She inherited 2060000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2014, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
